value.string:
Prerequisites: 
1. Please Place The Main_Config.xlsx File In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Config
2. Place "Customer List.xlsx", "Input Data On Demand.xlsx" and "Wholesale Shipments Data.xlsx" files in C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input
Last Updated Apr 2023: Integrated microsoft forms data
The config file is missing. Kindly contact your system administrator or the bot development team to help you out

The config file is missing. Kindly contact your system administrator or the bot development team to help you out
Kindly make sure you fulfill all the prequisites mentioned in line 4 of the MasterTask OR copy them from this messagebox before it closes

Prerequisites: 
1. Please Place The Main_Config.xlsx File In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Config
2. Please place the credit risk matrix templates In C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input\Credit Risk Matrix Templates
3. Rename those template files and follow the nomenclacure pattern "VendorID CompanyName Credit Risk Matrix Template"
e.g: 101594 Great Lakes Work Wear Credit Risk Matrix Template
4. Place "Customer List.csv" file in C:\RPAProcesses\Credit Risk Matrix\Input
Create bot exception log file and bot summary file
If request if bulk then read data for input file without FSS

Task Name: MasterTask_CreditRiskMatrix_DataOnDemand
Status:Initiated
Data Request Type: Bulk Data Without FSS

Thanks,
Credit Risk Matrix Bot
Below task bot will only remove the rows with request status as closed and will not read any form data
